short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to change the wdith of the table to display all the data on single line

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KFUTable use to change wdith of the table to make the table extendable.

why do you need KFUTable
1- if you do not know css
2- if you do not know how to edit the css in browser
